segments.text: I notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink like a tiny waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s spreading across the floor, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and the stool looks ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen feels like it’s on the verge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though I know something bad might happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything seem so calm, but it’s all an illusion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
